post:
VPS.AG is happy to help you in your business. All of our private servers (VPS) are based on Powerful Intel Xeon CPUs with at least 128 GB RAM and RAID10 HDD configuration with SSD Cache, with 1 gbps Uplink.


We have four recommended configurations but if you need something custom, all our packages are fully customizable to give you the perfect solution for your needs. No overselling or shared resources.


SSD OPENVZ UNMANAGED VPS
This VPS is fully customizable.
1 Dedicated Core from Intel Xeon E5-2440 v2
1GB DDR3 ECC RAM
10GB RAID 10 SSD+HDD
Linux OS templates
Control panel cPanel+WHM (Optional +15EUR)
VNC Connection for direct hardware-like administration
1 IP free
Network Speed 1gbps Uplink
1TB Bandwidth
Starting at EUR 5



SSD KVM UNMANAGED VDS
This VPS is fully customizable.
2 Cores from Intel Xeon E5-2440 v2
2GB DDR3 ECC RAM
30GB RAID 10 SSD+HDD
Linux OS templates
Control panel cPanel+WHM (Optional +15EUR)
VNC Connection for direct hardware-like administration
1 IP free
Network Speed 1gbps Uplink
1TB Bandwidth
Starting at EUR 12

This VPS is fully customizable.

All Virtual Servers Include:
Automated Setup in less than 1 Hour for KVM and less than 5 minutes for OpenVZ
Free Installation of OS & Control Panel
Full Root & VNC access
Migration Services
Administration options available
1 Free IPv4 address
Our VPS nodes are connected to the Internet using 10gbps Uplinks
Up to 99.99% Availability Guarantee
High reliability
Excellent privacy
Free 24/7 Support (Live-Chat/Support Tickets)
Monthly payment & No minimum contract period
Fixed price for the whole period
Premium Hardware
Cloud-based infrastructure
Server Location in Central Europe - Bulgaria
Secure Tier 3+ Datacenter in Sofia



Pricing:
1 month - no discount
6 months - 10% discount per month
12 months - 20% discount per month


Q: What payment options are available?
A: Currently we support PayPal, WebMoney, Bitcoin, PaySafeCard and PerfectMoney.
